topic.title: Starting and Stopping the Metering Conveyor Scale

othermeta.name: title
othermeta.content: Starting and Stopping the Metering Conveyor Scale

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Stepwise start-up and shutdown procedures, pre-start checks and emergency-stop instructions for the metering conveyor scale.

othermeta.name: entities
othermeta.content: metering conveyor scale;load cell;drive motor;control panel;emergency stop

li.p: Perform the following checks before starting up the metering conveyor scale:

ul.li: Inspect the metering conveyor scale for visible damage, and correct any problems before operating.
Verify that the safety mechanisms are installed and in proper condition.
Verify that the rotary survey is installed and functioning correctly.
Verify that the feed and discharge unit is connected correctly.
Make sure that no personnel are present in the danger area or in the areas of movement of machine parts.

li.p: To turn on the metering conveyor scale:

ul.li: Switch the lockable main switch to On.
Acknowledge the emergency stop using the operating screen.

li.p: To turn off the metering conveyor scale:

ul.li: Use the user interface at the control cabinet.
The metering conveyor scale continues to run and terminates the movements of the actuators.
Then switch off the metering conveyor scale using the lockable main switch.

li.p: If a fault or malfunction occurs, this is indicated at the user interface.

note.p: For information about possible errors and malfunctions and the procedure for eliminating errors, see the electrical documentation.
